DryadDataFile.dcterms:creator: Houadria, Mickal
Klimes, Petr
Fayle, Tom
Gullan, Penny
DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Host-plant dissections reveal contrasting distributions of Crematogaster ants and their symbionts in two myrmecophytic Macaranga species
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Here we compared two myrmecophytic systems, Macaranga trachyphylla with Crematogaster captiosa (Mt+Cc) and M. beccariana with C. decamera (Mb+Cd), using a fine-scale dissection of the stems. For the two plant species, for each internode we recorded both contents (ants, coccids, refuse piles) and structure (internode height, numbers of open and occluded ant holes)
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: mutualism
myrmecophytes
symbiosis
scale insect
nematode
co-occurrence
